attributes.action: grant all ex members of the Gurkha Regiments automatic rights to British Citizenship regardless of where they served or when and to further grant them equal rights, pay and pensions with British Soldiers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gurkhas have been fighting and dying for this country for the past 200 years and are held in high esteem by the British people. It is ludicrous and ubelievable that they are being denied the right to settle in this country, and have to go through the immigration procedures, when we allow people of other countries in without question. This country owes a debt of gratitude to these brave soldiers and the least this government can do is to ensure that they are treated equally with other members of the armed forces on pay, pensions and settlement.

rejection.details:
